code: var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';function _getResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){return _getResponse(res);});};export var authorization=function authorization(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){return _getResponse(res);});};export var tokenCheck=function tokenCheck(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return _getResponse(res);});};
